com.quantimodo.tools

Interface QApplication

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QBaseApplication

    public interface QApplication
    Should provide dependencies and EventBus for other components of quantimodo-tools For example implementations see QBaseApplication

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToGraph(Object object) 
      <T> T getInstanceOf(Class<T> t) 
      Class<? extends QSpiceService> getServiceClass()
      QuantimodoTools uses Robospice as request processor You need to implement QSpiceService, and provide class object of this implementation in this method Don't forget to add this service in AndroidManifest.xml For more info check QSpiceService
      Class<? extends SyncService> getSyncServiceClass()
      Sync service, which should provide syncing with QuantiModo For into check SyncService

      • getServiceClass

        Class<? extends QSpiceService> getServiceClass()
        QuantimodoTools uses Robospice as request processor You need to implement QSpiceService, and provide class object of this implementation in this method Don't forget to add this service in AndroidManifest.xml For more info check QSpiceService
        Returns:
        QSpiceService derived class
